overview: Come ye, come ye, to hear the quiversome tale of the Blood Red Blood Ruby of Doom from across the seven seas, whose capture will either cast the world into despair or bring about peace and harmony! Marvel, as plucky young pirate Moses pits her wits against villainous sea-dog Peg Leg Olle to seize the gem, save the day and solve the riddlesome riddle of her birth! Moses the Pirate is a swashbuckling adventure full of heart, guts, and hope for a better world, led by a young girl whose goodness is matched only by her derring-do.
title: Moses the Pirate
